articles.author: Loni Prinsloo and Antony Sguazzin
articles.title: African Union tells members it has 15 million vaccines from US - News24
articles.description: The African Union and the Africa Centres for Disease Control and Prevention have told health ministers on the continent that they have 15 million Covid-19 vaccines donated by the US that are ready for distribution.

articles.title: Akani Simbine breaks SA and African 100m record in Hungary - News24
articles.description: South African sprinter Akani Simbine is reaching peak form ahead of the Olympic Games in Tokyo as he obliterated the field in a 100m event in Hungary.
articles.content:

articles.description: The Lions' third fixture in South Africa against the Blue Bulls in Pretoria on Saturday has been postponed after four players and one member of staff tested positive. The game may be refixed for Wednesday, July 21.

articles.description: SpaceX's Starship cargo craft could hoover up dead satellites, used rocket parts, and other debris simply by opening its door, CEO Elon Musk said.
